Name: The Legend of Gandar II
About the game: The Legend of Gandar II takes place four years after the events of The Legend of Gandar. Since Tommy has mysteriously passed away, Lisa must once again save the world of Gandar and write her story in this world. A renewed fight between humans and monsters arises. Many dire threats are just waiting for Lisa, this time whether she can save the world of Gandar or rather bring it to ruin is entirely up to you. But be careful, the same trick doesn't always work on the monsters. The Legend of Gandar II is again based on an 2D action-adventure video game. The combat system in the game is based on an RPG and you see the world (including objects) in a bird's eye view. The next part (The Legend of Gandar II) now has a new and unique story, which the player can often change with his decisions. Key Features Adventure Mode Combat system in 2D RPG fantasy
